      <span id="bc_guide_name">
       Introduction to International Studies (Herrick)
      </span>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Introduction to International Studies (Herrick) &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Aug 17, 2016
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/ist101
     </span>
     <span class="printguideurl" style="padding:0px 10px 0px 10px;">
      <span class="iprint">
       <a href="/print_content.php?pid=692967&amp;sid=5748153&amp;mode=g" title="View in a format suitable for printers and screen readers">
        Print Guide
       </a>
      </span>
     </span>
     <span class="rssupdatelink" style="padding:0px 10px; border-left:dotted thin #666666;">
      <span class="irss">
       <a href="#" onclick="return showDlg('RSS Updates','/process_content.php?m=rssupdates&amp;iid=3322&amp;pid=692967&amp;sid=5748153&amp;gid=0&amp;uid=63913',0)" title="Subscribe to Updates via RSS">
        RSS Updates
       </a>
      </span>
     </span>
    </div>
    <div id="tabs12" class="singlepage">

         Home
        </span>
       </a>
      </li>
     </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="stitle" id="guide_tab_title_bar">
     <table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" valign="top">
      <tr>
       <td align="left" width="65%" height="23" nowrap="nowrap">
        <span id="guide_tab_title_bar_page_name">
         Home
        </span>
        <span id="guide_tab_title_bar_page_print" class="font11">
         <span class="iprint">
          <a href="/print_content.php?pid=692967&amp;sid=5748153" title="View in a format suitable for printers and screen readers">
           Print Page
          </a>
         </span>
        </span>
       </td>
       <td align="right" style="white-space:nowrap;">
        <span class="lgsearch">
        </span>
        <form method="post" name="homesearch" style="display:inline;">
         <!--labels to help with accessibility -->
         <label for="searchs" style="display:none;">
          Search Text
         </label>
         <label for="what" style="display:none;">
          Search Type
         </label>
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
          <tr>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_label" class="lgsearch_item">
             &nbsp;&nbsp;Search:&nbsp;
            </div>
           </td>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_field" class="lgsearch_item">
             <input type="text" class="searchField" name="searchs" id="searchs" onkeypress="return handleEnterSearch(event,'homesearch','customSearch()');" />
             &nbsp;
            </div>
           </td>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_dropdown" class="lgsearch_item">
             <select id="what" name="what" class="dropdownform" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;">
              <option value="/search.php?iid=3322&amp;c=0&amp;gid=0&amp;pid=692967&amp;search=">
               This Guide
              </option>
              <option value="/search.php?iid=3322&amp;gid=0&amp;c=0&amp;search=">
               All Guides
              </option>
             </select>
            </div>
           </td>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_button" class="lgsearch_item" style="padding-right:2px;">
             <button dojotype="dijit.form.Button" type="button" name="fb" onclick="customSearch();" style="font-size:10px;">
              Search
             </button>
            </div>
           </td>
          </tr>
         </table>
        </form>
       </td>

    </div>
    <div id="commentslistp5748153" style="display:none; margin:0px 10px;">
    </div>
    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:758px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21681378">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21681378">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21681378">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Tools for Developing Topic Ideas
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content21681378">
          <p>
           <strong>
            NEWS
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://www.bbc.com/news/world">
            BBC News: World
           </a>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="https://news.google.com/news/section?cf=all&amp;pz=1&amp;ned=us&amp;topic=w&amp;siidp=e300df32204cea55a77ffed8a5fc1583c541&amp;ict=ln">
            Google News: World
           </a>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://www.mondotimes.com/">
            Mondo Times -- the Worldwide News Media Guide
           </a>
           <br />
           Links to local media in the United States and worldwide, including newspaper, TV stations, news radio stations, and online news sources.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://www.nytimes.com/">
            New York Times
           </a>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://www.washingtonpost.com/">
            Washington Post
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            COUNTRY INFORMATION
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.europaworld.com/">
            Europa World Yearbook
           </a>
           <br />
           Information by country on a variety of topics, including: contemporary political history, constitution and government, economic affairs, and more.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://library.cqpress.com/phw/">
            Political Handbook of the World
           </a>
           <br />
           Information by country on a variety of topics, including: government and politics, constitution, foreign affairs, political and opposition parties, and more.
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            OTHER
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com">
            Credo Reference
           </a>
           <br />
           Hundreds of dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas, including many notable titles for political science. Full text is linked directly in the database.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://www.state.gov/">
            U.S. Department of State
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21681378" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21681411">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21681411">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21681411">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Tools for Finding Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content21681411">
          <p>
           <strong>
            SCHOLARLY, PEER-REVIEWED ARTICLES
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aph">
            Academic Search Complete
           </a>
           <br />
           A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library. Use the Academic Journals filter to narrow your search results to scholarly sources.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/">
            Trexler Library Subject Guides
            <br />
           </a>
           Subject Guides point you to recommended resources in each subject area. Look for the subject area related to your research interest and then for databases recommended for that subject.
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            POPULAR ARTICLES
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aph">
            Academic Search Complete
           </a>
           <br />
           A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library. Use the Magazines and/or Newspapers filters to narrow your search results to popular sources.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic">
            LexisNexis Academic
           </a>
           <br />
           A database of popular newspapers, magazines, and broadcast transcripts, as well as business publications, legal materials, and more. Full text is linked directly in the database.
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            GOVERNMENT SOURCES
           </strong>
           <br />
           <br />
           NOTE: Take note of government agencies, government documents, and other government-related references in your scholarly and popular sources that may be helpful in directing your searching here.
          </p>
          <p>
           NOTE: Access to government documents from other countries via these resources depends largely on how available each country makes them.&nbsp; Language may prove to be another barrier.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="https://www.google.com/">
            Google
           </a>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic">
            LexisNexis Academic
           </a>
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aph">
            <br />
           </a>
           A database of popular newspapers, magazines, and broadcast transcripts, as well as business publications, legal materials, and more. Full text is linked directly in the database. Look for BBC Monitoring reports under News Transcripts, especially, to get translations of government press releases and other sources originating from governments.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://www.law.cornell.edu/world/">
            Legal Information Institute, Law by Source: Global
           </a>
           (Cornell University)
           <br />
           The LII collection of world legal materials gathers, country by country, continent by continent, the Internet-accessible sources of the constitutions, statutes, judicial opinions, and related legal material from around the globe (excluding the U.S. material held in the LII's other collections). It also holds resources and document collections of International Law.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://www.washlaw.edu/forint/index.html">
            WashLaw Web: Foreign and International Law
           </a>
           (Washburn University School of Law Library)
           <br />
           Links to foreign and international legal resources and research tools. It's especially strong on finding legal materials from specific countries
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="http://www.worldlii.org/catalog/215.html">
            World Legal Information Institute
           </a>
           <br />
           Links to constitutions, laws, treaties, international agreements, and related resources by country.
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            WEBSITES
            <br />
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p>
           NOTE: Take note of organizations mentioned in your scholarly and popular sources that may be helpful in directing your searching here.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <a href="https://www.google.com/">
            Google
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21681411" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21681476">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21681476">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21681476">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Your Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content21681476">
          <p>
           For information on using
           <strong>
            Chicago Style
           </strong>
           , see the
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357836&amp;sid=2978374">
            Political Science Subject Guide: Citations
           </a>
           tab.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21681476" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5748153" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21681367">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21681367">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21681367">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need Help with Your Research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17117745">
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
           <b>
            Jen Jarson
           </b>
           <br />
           Social Sciences Reference Librarian
           <br />
           phone: 484-664-3552
           <br />
           email: jarson@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17117745" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">

      </table>
      <div id="popupinfotitle" style="display:inline;">
       <h6>
        More Information
       </h6>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="popup_body">
      <div id="popupinfocontent" style="display:inline;">
       <img alt="Loading" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/indicator.gif" />
       &nbsp; Loading...
      </div>
      <br />
      <center>
       <a href="#" onclick="hideAlert('popupinfo'); return false;">
        Close
       </a>
      </center>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div id="dp" style="width:850px;">
   &nbsp;
  </div>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   cssdropdown.startchrome("tabs12");
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   SpringTrack.trackPage({ 
                        st_type : content_config.hitsource, 
                        _st_gid : content_config.gid 
                    });
  </script>
 </body>
</html>
